faqs.question: How often should I visit after placement?
faqs.answer: Recommended schedule: First 2 weeks - daily visits to ensure proper transition and catch issues early. Weeks 3-4 - every other day as comfort increases. Ongoing - 3-4x weekly at varying times (include evenings/weekends to see different staff shifts). Monitor: skin condition, cleanliness, hydration, meal consumption, mood changes, medication administration. Warning signs requiring immediate action: unexplained injuries, dramatic personality changes, weight loss, dehydration, soiled clothing, medication errors. Escalation: Charge nurse → Director of Nursing → Administrator → State CT Department of Health → Consider transfer.
